オプション1:
Star Man crept toward the voice.
Peering that way, he saw a man with a trapezoid head lying down.

The man looked on the verge of death.
Star Man dragged his heavy body closer.

The man was covered in bruises and bleeding all over.
Both his legs had swollen to about three times their normal size.

"Both legs are broken...
I fell from high up... I was dropped..."
Even speaking seemed painful for him.

"Should I go find some fruit outside and bring it?
I only find it once in a while, though..."

"There are coconut trees toward the sea.
Ngh... with those... you can definitely get water."
"The place where the coconut trees grow... is pretty far."
"I see. But I want to learn a sure way to get water as soon as possible."

[The sun rises in the east and sets in the west.
Watch the sun's direction and head for the coconut trees.]
